parameters.name: Environment Variables
parameters.description:
Environment variables in key=value format, one per line. Each line sets an environment variable in the container configuration. Example:
MYAPP_HOST=localhost
MYAPP_PORT=8080
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://localhost:5432/mydb
parameters.default:
PGRST_ANON_ROLE=api_anon
PGRST_DB_ANON_ROLE=api_anon
PGRST_DB_SCHEMAS=public
PGRST_DB_URI=postgres://api_login:{{ API_LOGIN_PASSWORD }}@postgres:5432/postgres
PGRST_JWT_SECRET={{ JWT_SECRET }}
PGRST_SCHEMAS=public
PGRST_SERVER_PORT=3000
POSTGREST_PORT=3000
POSTGREST_VERSION=latest
POSTGRES_DB=postgres
